translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The reverse order of the law of conditionality, The Paṭṭhāna text with the Tikas

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽23.31. Parittārammaṇattika, Kusalattika🔽Naparittārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā parittārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  paritta ārammaṇa ttika kusala ttika  na paritta ārammaṇam na kusalam dhammam paccayā paritta ārammaṇaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: The Triad on Limited Object, the Triad on Wholesome🔽With a not limited object and not wholesome as condition there arises a limited object and wholesome consciousness. (In brief) … With a cause as condition, twenty-one. … With an unobscured as condition, twenty-one.🔽With a not limited object and not wholesome as condition there arises a limited object and unwholesome consciousness. (In brief) … With a cause as condition, fourteen. … With an unobscured as condition, fourteen.🔽With a not limited object and not indeterminate as condition there arises a limited object and indeterminate consciousness. (In brief) … With a cause as condition, twenty-one. … With an unobscured as condition, twenty-one.

original: Naparittārammaṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā parittārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cuddasa …pe… avigate cuddasa.🔽Naparittārammaṇo naabyākato dhammo parittārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: na paritta ārammaṇam na akusalam dhammam paccayā paritta ārammaṇaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cuddasa pe avigate cuddasa  na paritta ārammaṇaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ paritta ārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena
translated: With a not limited object and not indeterminate as condition there arises a limited object and indeterminate consciousness. (In brief) … With a cause as condition, twenty-one. … With an unobscured as condition, twenty-one.🔽With a not limited object and not indeterminate as condition there arises a limited object and indeterminate consciousness. (In brief) … With a cause as condition, twenty-one. … With an unobscured as condition, twenty-one.🔽With a not limited object and not indeterminate as condition there arises a limited object and indeterminate consciousness. (In brief) … With a cause as condition, twenty-one. … With an unobscured as condition, twenty-one.

original: paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) … Ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare🔽ekavīsa, upanissaye ekavīsa, natthiyā vigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: paccayo saṅkhitta ārammaṇe ekavīsa adhipatiyā nava anantare samanantare 🔽ekavīsa upanissaye ekavīsa natthiyāḥ vigate ekavīsa
translated: With a not limited object and not indeterminate as condition there arises a limited object and indeterminate consciousness.
